column4: Not necessarily.  A lot of themes on DeviantArt are in ZIP archives
sounds like ones to avoide to me
Why do you say that?  I've had no problems with them

/ Lasivian : IIRC, from having the same problem at one point, the issue is that the network interface goes down before it tries to unmount the filesystems, so Samba/CIFS can't actually communicate the unmounting with the server
